channel.title: Guys we need a coop Mode
channel.description:
Hey guys,
The best thing what the developers can do is a coop mode for this mod :smiley: I love the mod and want to play it togheter with my friends :smiley:
so Developers Please make a coop mod :slight_smile: it would make the game perfect.

item.title: Guys we need a coop Mode
item.dc:creator: Hyperbyte
item.description:
Another question answered.

Read full topic
item.source: Guys we need a coop Mode

item.title: Guys we need a coop Mode
item.dc:creator: Solokiller
item.description:
The devs have already stated that they’re not going to add co-op mode, it would require changing every map to accommodate multiple players, which is far too much work, especially now that the mod has been released. There’s also the balancing issues that come with having more than one player, and having to deal with players dieing properly.

Read full topic
item.source: Guys we need a coop Mode

item.title: Guys we need a coop Mode
item.dc:creator: Paz_Ortega_Andrade
item.description:
Even if developers will make a co-op modification for this game, it won’t happen any time soon, since the game itself is not fully completed yet.

Read full topic
item.source: Guys we need a coop Mode
